price: Nokorε sε abɔdeɛ bͻne wͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ ne asosifoͻ ne mmum, wͻn a wͻnnwen (anaa wͻnte asεm aseε) no.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
